item.title: CONJUNTO 113 FRONTAL BY PAULO JUNIOR 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 28, 2025

CONJUNTO 113 FRONTAL BY PAULO JUNIOR 1.53 ETS2

The Conjunto 113 Frontal by Paulo Junior mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 features a classic Scania 113 frontal (flat-nose) truck and trailer combination, inspired by Brazilian trucking culture. It includes high-quality exterior and interior models, realistic engine sounds, smooth driving physics, and authentic detailing. The mod offers customization options for both the truck and trailer, including paint jobs and accessories. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, it’s perfect for fans of vintage Scania trucks and Brazilian-style hauling.

Credits: PAULO JUNIOR EQUIPE CLASSE A

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: FH1 BY PAULO JUNIOR 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 28, 2025

FH1 BY PAULO JUNIOR 1.53 ETS2

The FH1 by Paulo Junior mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 adds a classic first-generation Volvo FH truck, faithfully recreated with a Brazilian touch. It features high-quality modeling, a detailed interior, realistic engine sounds, and smooth driving physics. The mod includes customization options such as chassis types, tuning parts, accessories, and paint jobs. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is ideal for players who enjoy vintage Volvo trucks with authentic regional styling.

Credits: PAULO JUNIOR EQUIPE CLASSE A

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: VOLVO MAX 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 28, 2025

VOLVO MAX 1.53 ETS2

The Volvo Max mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 introduces a custom high-performance Volvo truck designed for heavy-duty hauling with a bold, modified look. It features high-quality 3D modeling, a detailed interior, realistic engine sounds, and accurate driving physics. The mod offers various customization options, including chassis configurations, tuning parts, lighting, and paint jobs. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is ideal for players seeking a powerful and uniquely styled Volvo truck.

Credits: RILDO MENEZES

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: SCANIA 124 F 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 28, 2025

SCANIA 124 F 1.53 ETS2

The Scania 124 F mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 introduces a classic flat-front Scania truck, widely recognized in South American fleets. It features high-quality exterior and interior models, realistic engine sounds, accurate driving physics, and a nostalgic design. The mod includes various customization options, such as chassis types, accessories, and paint jobs. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is ideal for fans of vintage Scania trucks looking for an authentic and immersive driving experience.

Credits: PAULO JUNIOR EQUIPE CLASSE A

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Iveco 180 NC/NT 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 28, 2025

Iveco 180 NC/NT 1.53 ETS2

The Iveco 180 NC/NT mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) version 1.53 introduces a vintage and iconic Iveco truck from the 1970s–1980s era. It features high-quality exterior and interior modeling, realistic engine sounds, and classic driving physics. The mod includes customization options such as chassis types, paint jobs, and accessories to suit various transport needs. Fully optimized for ETS2 1.53, this mod is perfect for fans of old-school European trucks and nostalgic driving experiences.

Credits: QRA SOL

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder.
